item.title: Playing around with streamlit dashboards
item.description: Playing around with streamlit dashboards Intro Exploring a few tools Project structure Overview of dplyr activity Deploying + Streamlit Share + Google App Engine Closing remarks [Extra] Profiling slow methods References and notes Intro A few weeks ago I have stumbled upon this post on hackernews containing a captivating piece of data visualization on the development history of git. I believe the visualization is particularly powerful for a few different reasons:
